channel.title: Version 7 :: Hugo Relearn Theme
channel.description: 7.2.0.beta (XXXX-XX-XX) Change Change Due to refactoring, the expand shortcode and the notice shortcode with style=transparent now generate slightly different margins. New New The theme has updated its Mermaid dependency to 11.4.1. This adds support for Kanban diagrams. 7.1.0 (2024-10-25) Change Change The sidebar menus are now completely configurable.
